string-array.name: super_hero_details
string-array.item: Got bitten by a Spider and earned the Spider Senses
Very strong man that knows how to fly and shoot laser from his eyes
Very rich man with no powers, so he built a super techy suit
Another rich man with no powers, who wears black cape and protects Gotham City
